channel.title: Tag: robots - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels and self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Moravec’s Cats
item.description: Every ship-morning, I woke up covered in a half-dozen cats. Sometime in the ship-night, they’d wander in from the ducts and find spots to curl up around my sleeping body, virtually pinning me under the sheet and all purring from speaker grilles when I stirred.
